languages.text: "Слишком долго он оставался среди живых. Пришло время физически стать тем, чем он и так является в душе — падалью".
"He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."
languages.original_text: "Слишком долго он оставался среди живых. Пришло время физически стать тем, чем он и так является в душе — падалью".

traits.locale_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “他已经逍遥法外太久了，是时候让他的肉体变得像他的灵魂一样了，让他彻底烂透吧。”
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: “他已经逍遥法外太久了，是时候让他的肉体变得像他的灵魂一样了，让他彻底烂透吧。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà trop longtemps qu'il demeure parmi les vivants. Il est temps que son corps devienne ce que son âme est d'ores et déjà : une charogne. »
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà trop longtemps qu'il demeure parmi les vivants. Il est temps que son corps devienne ce que son âme est d'ores et déjà : une charogne. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lleva demasiado entre los vivos. Es hora de que pase a ser físicamente lo que ya es en su alma: carroña».
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: «Lleva demasiado entre los vivos. Es hora de que pase a ser físicamente lo que ya es en su alma: carroña».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「奴は長生きしすぎています。その肉体を魂と同じ姿の… 腐肉にしてやりましょう」
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: 「奴は長生きしすぎています。その肉体を魂と同じ姿――腐肉にしてやりましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Er weilt schon viel zu lange unter den Lebenden. Es wird Zeit, dass er auch körperlich wird, was er in seiner Seele längst ist — Aas."
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Er weilt schon viel zu lange unter den Lebenden. Es wird Zeit, dass er auch körperlich wird, was er in seiner Seele längst ist — Aas."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

languages.text: "Fânilerin arasında fazla uzun kaldı. Artık ruhunda taşıdığı gerçeğe, leşliğe kavuşma vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: "He has remained among the living for too long. It is time for him to physically become what he already is in his soul — carrion."

traits.locale_text: "Fânilerin arasında fazla uzun süre kaldı. Artık ruhunda taşıdığı gerçeğe, leşliğe kavuşma vakti geldi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
